body_html: Sorry for the slow reply on this one, but thanks for the fix! The background is that the gemmlowp library used to fail to compile on Windows so rules that used them were disabled, but this has been fixed recently, so since the CI builds work this is good to go.
body_text: Sorry for the slow reply on this one, but thanks for the fix! The background is that the gemmlowp library used to fail to compile on Windows so rules that used them were disabled, but this has been fixed recently, so since the CI builds work this is good to go.
